skills.title: Front-End Development
skills.description: Expertise in crafting responsive, user-friendly interfaces using the latest web technologies, ensuring seamless and engaging user experiences.

skills.title: Back-End Development
skills.description: Proficient in building robust and scalable server-side applications, managing databases, and ensuring data security and integrity.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Skilled in designing intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces, focusing on enhancing usability and optimizing user interaction.

skills.title: Software Architecture
skills.description: Experienced in designing scalable and efficient software architectures, ensuring optimal performance, maintainability, and alignment with business goals.

portfolio.title: Travel Concierge
portfolio.description: This web system supports hotel guests in accessing essential services such as room booking, retail, and transport. It enhances the guest experience by offering convenience and ease during their stay.

portfolio.title: Software Tool
portfolio.description: A desktop application designed for software architects and developers. It simplifies code generation by converting design into functional code with a single click, focusing on system logic.

portfolio.title: Memory Game
portfolio.description: A simple yet engaging memory game that challenges players to match pairs of cards. It sharpens memory skills and provides a fun, interactive gaming experience for users of all ages.

testimonial.description: Desta consistently demonstrates exceptional problem-solving skills and creativity. They approach complex assignments with a unique perspective, delivering solutions that exceed expectations. A true leader in the classroom.
Working with Desta has been an absolute pleasure. Their ability to take on challenging projects and provide innovative solutions is truly remarkable. They are a standout student in every sense.

Desta's commitment to quality and timely delivery is unparalleled. They treat every project as if it were for a real client, and their work consistently reflects this dedication. A highly recommended team player.
